name: ELT
overview: ELT, Inc. provides online legal workplace compliance training, including sexual harassment training, ethics and code of conduct training, and EEO/EEOC compliance training. It offers various courses, including basic compliance for the entire workforce; workplace harassment I; workplace harassment II; workplace harassment refresher; ethics and code of conduct; wage and hour; workplace diversity; equal employment opportunity; lawful hiring; lawful terminations; cyber policy; workplace privacy; and workplace violence. The company offers its services for customers in various industries, including automotive and transportation services; banking, financial and insurance; business and consumer services; charitable and membership organizations; computer hardware and software; construction and real estate; electronics and telecommunications; energy, metals and mining; food, beverage, and hospitality; government and education; healthcare and pharmaceuticals; media; and retail and consumer products. ELT, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
